cast.overview: A young woman’s quest for revenge against the people who kidnapped and tortured her as a child leads her and her best friend, also a victim of child abuse, on a terrifying journey into a living hell of depravity.
cast.title: Martyrs

crew.overview: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L. Team 6 in May, 2011.
crew.title: Zero Dark Thirty

crew.overview: A young woman’s quest for revenge against the people who kidnapped and tortured her as a child leads her and her best friend, also a victim of child abuse, on a terrifying journey into a living hell of depravity.
crew.title: Martyrs

details.biography: Gaelle Cohen is an internationally acclaimed stunt coordinator and performer who has worked on over 100 films and television productions. Born and raised in France, Cohen first earned a law degree before embarking on an enviable career in the entertainment industry. A former member of the French National Fencing team, she got her start performing fight sequences for the television show, "Highlander" in 1995, launching her career as a stunt woman. As a stunt coordinator, her signature action sequences have captured attention within the industry for their earthy realism.
details.name: Gaëlle Cohen
